title: FREQ_MEASURE (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK FREQ_MEASURE
Measures the frequency of a signal

rows:
A period is the time between two rising edges of the input signal.OUTwill equal the average frequency during the givenPERIODS(number of periods; minimal 1 maximal 10).
The function block will not work unless this value is between 1 and 10.

FALSE: As long as the first measure has been finished.  Or time distance between two rising edges >3*OUT.
(Indicates that something is wrong with the inputs)
